accountsWithProvisionedRestoreAccesses.description: All of the Amazon Web Services accounts that have access to restore a snapshot to a provisioned cluster.

accountsWithRestoreAccesses.description: All of the Amazon Web Services accounts that have access to restore a snapshot to a namespace.

adminUsername.description: The username of the database within a snapshot.

arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the snapshot.

kmsKeyId.description: The unique identifier of the KMS key used to encrypt the snapshot.

namespaceArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the namespace the snapshot was created from.

namespaceName.description: The namespace to create a snapshot for.

ownerAccount.description: The owner Amazon Web Services; account of the snapshot.

retentionPeriod.description: How long to retain the created snapshot. Default value is `-1`.

namespaceName.description: The namespace to create a snapshot for.

retentionPeriod.description: How long to retain the created snapshot. Default value is `-1`.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Snapshot resources.

accountsWithRestoreAccesses.description: All of the Amazon Web Services accounts that have access to restore a snapshot to a namespace.

arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the snapshot.

kmsKeyId.description: The unique identifier of the KMS key used to encrypt the snapshot.

namespaceArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the namespace the snapshot was created from.
